draw_blog.updateCmd: git checkout themes && git pull origin master
draw_blog.postUpdateCmd: nvm use 14 && npm install && cd themes/kratos-rebirth && npm install && cd ../..  && npm run build
draw_blog.startCmd: pm2 start 'nvm use 14 && npm run server' --name draw_blog

gamedeck.updateCmd: git checkout themes && git pull origin gamedeck
gamedeck.postUpdateCmd: npm install && cd themes/gamedeck-theme && npm install && cd ../.. && npm run build

heatmob.updateCmd: git checkout themes && git pull origin heatmob
